function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor housing conditions contributing to moderate-severe and severe depressive symptoms in students","Impact":"Worse quality of life, worsened working performance, and increased risk of depressive symptoms","Mitigation":"Improving housing quality, providing mental health support for students, and implementing measures to support working from home","Technologies":"Smart home technology for improved indoor environment, remote working tools for better work-from-home experience","People":"Students, remote workers","Owner":"Schools, employers"},{"Description":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine during infectious disease outbreaks","Impact":"Psychological distress, anxiety, depressive symptoms, fear, irritability, anger, emotional exhaustion, insomnia, and long-term behavioral changes","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, clear guidelines, and financial assistance during and post-quarantine","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote mental health support, digital platforms for clear communication and guidelines","People":"Quarantined individuals, general public","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential impact of built environment on physical and mental health of individuals and community","Impact":"Influence on physical and mental health, particularly during periods of quarantine and isolation","Mitigation":"Designing built environments to promote health and well-being, incorporating green spaces, and improving housing conditions","Technologies":"Urban planning software for designing health-promoting environments, sustainable building materials for improved housing","People":"Community members, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Local authorities, developers"}]}
